TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RijndaelManaged extends System.Security.Cryptography.Rijndael
Public NotInheritable Class RijndaelManaged Inherits Rijndael
public ref class RijndaelManaged sealed : System::Security::Cryptography::Rijndael

summary.span: 访问 算法的托管版本。

span.span: Accesses the managed version of the algorithm.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此算法支持的密钥长度为128、192或256位;默认为256位。This algorithm supports key lengths of 128, 192, or 256 bits; defaulting to 256 bits. 在 .NET Framework 中，此算法支持128、192或256位的块大小;默认为128位 ( 兼容的) 。In .NET Framework, this algorithm supports block sizes of 128, 192, or 256 bits; defaulting to 128 bits (-compatible). 在 .NET Core 中，它与 AES 相同，并且仅支持128位块大小。In .NET Core, it is the same as AES and supports only a 128-bit block size. > [!IMPORTANT] > 类是算法的前置任务 。The class is the predecessor of the algorithm. 应使用 算法而不是 。You should use the algorithm instead of . 有关详细信息，请参阅 .NET Security 博客中的 [Rijndael 与 AES 之间的差异](https://docs.microsoft.com/archive/blogs/shawnfa/the-differences-between-rijndael-and-aes) 。For more information, see the entry [The Differences Between Rijndael and AES](https://docs.microsoft.com/archive/blogs/shawnfa/the-differences-between-rijndael-and-aes) in the .NET Security blog. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用类对示例数据进行加密和解密 `RijndaelManaged` 。The following example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt sample data using the `RijndaelManaged` class. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/RijndaelManaged Example/CPP/class1.cpp" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/RijndaelManaged Example/CS/class1.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/RijndaelManaged Example/VB/class1.vb" id="Snippet1":::

summary.span: 获取或设置加密操作的块大小（以位为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the block size, in bits, of the cryptographic operation.

value.span: 加密操作的块大小，以位为单位。

span.span: The block size, in bits, of the cryptographic operation.
The default is 128 bits.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 .NET Framework 中，Rijndael 的有效块大小值为128、192和256位。In .NET Framework, the valid block size values for Rijndael are 128, 192 and 256 bits. 在 .NET Core 中，Rijndael 的块大小只能为128位。In .NET Core, the block size for Rijndael can only be 128 bits. 有关 块大小的详细信息，请参阅。See the for more information about block size.
